main event: A civilian observed a star-like object in the sky in Farmingville, New York on October 29, 1966.
interesting points: The object was white and appeared illuminated or reflecting light,The observation lasted for 175 minutes,The object made sharp turns and eventually hovered over Smithtown,The observer had extensive knowledge of astronomy,The weather conditions at the time were clear with 10 miles of visibility.
witness description: The observer was a 52-year-old retired teacher with extensive knowledge of astronomy.
